XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle gradingform_multigraders plugin

TABLE.NAME: multigraders_definitions
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the grading definitions extra details.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the grading definition

FIELD.NAME: blind_marking
FIELD.COMMENT: Activates or deactivates blind marking, so that intermediary markers don't see previous grades

FIELD.NAME: show_intermediary_to_students
FIELD.COMMENT: If set to 1, shows intermediary grades and comments to student

FIELD.NAME: auto_calculate_final_method
FIELD.COMMENT: This defines what method is used to calculate the final grade from the previous: 0 - last previous grade, 1 - minimum previous grade, 2- maximum previous grade, 3- average

FIELD.NAME: secondary_graders_id_list
FIELD.COMMENT: The persons that will get notified if a second grader is required.

TABLE.NAME: multigraders_grades
TABLE.COMMENT: Grading information about a single grading for a single assignment submission.

FIELD.NAME: instanceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The grading instance this grade belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: itemid
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the item that is being graded

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The numerical grade for this assignment submission. Can be determined by scales/advancedgradingforms etc but will always be converted back to a floating point number.

FIELD.NAME: feedback
FIELD.COMMENT: The feedback given by the grader

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of grade. 1 is final, 0 is intermediary

FIELD.NAME: timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: This records when the grade was added and is also used for keeping the order of graders.

FIELD.NAME: visible_to_students
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether this grade and feedback should be visible to student or not

FIELD.NAME: outcomes
FIELD.COMMENT: This stores the values a grader has chosen for the outcomes in case the assignment uses outcomes

FIELD.NAME: require_second_grader
FIELD.COMMENT: This stores if the grader requested a another grader

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this grade.

KEY.NAME: instanceid
KEY.COMMENT: The grading instance this grade belongs to.

KEY.NAME: grader
KEY.COMMENT: The grader this grade was added by.
